name: Beer Buddy - Drink with me!
description: Beer Buddy is an app to let your friends know when you hang out, so they can join you. Simply choose any drink or any other activity in the app to notify your friends! Open the map and find friends already on the move.   Notify your friends when you   drink a beer (or any other alcoholic beverage)  are on a wild party  or just have a cup of coffee  WHY USE BEER BUDDY:   Best app for drinking with your friends  Its a great way to know whats going on and whos down to party  Dude, since I downloaded beer buddy I havent missed out on anything  Its like snapmaps for alcohol  Lets you know whos partying for the night! Join your friends or cheers em on beer buddy!  Its a great app for finding parties and finding out who wants to have a drink that night  Yo check out this sick app! We can see when people are drinking and make partys!   Accept your invitation now and join the party!  --------------------------------------------------------- MORE THAN >1 MILLION DRINKING BUDDIES ALREADY DRINK BEER TOGETHER!  Were always excited to hear from you! If you have feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at: support@beerbuddy.app ---------------------------------------------------------  Please play and drink responsibly. Alcohol consumption is not required.
